Description: Bianna Golodryga speaks with security experts Jim Sciutto and Colin Clarke about Israel’s strike in Beirut targeting a top Hezbollah commander.
Author: Ben Kirby

Headline: A war of nerves: Journalist reacts to Israeli strike in Beirut
Description: Bianna Golodryga speaks with journalist Kim Ghattas from Beirut about the Israeli strike appearing to target a Hezbollah commander.
Author: Ben Kirby

Headline: 'Just horrific': Two doctors recount what they witnessed in Gaza
Description: Dr. Feroze Sidhwa and Dr. Mark Perlmutter went to Gaza this spring to try to assist the collapsing healthcare system. They describe to Bianna Golodryga the ‘disaster’ they saw firsthand.
Author: Ben Kirby

Headline: CNN reporter explains why assassination of Hamas political leader is 'huge embarrassment' for Iran
Description: Ismail Haniyeh, Hamas’ political leader, has been killed in northern Tehran, Iran – the country is a key supporter of the militant group. CNN’s Nick Paton Walsh breaks down what is known about the assassination that happened in the early ...

Headline: Analyst on how Hamas political leader's death could impact ceasefire negotiations
Description: Bloomberg senior editor Bobby Ghosh joins CNN to discuss Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh’s death in Iran.

Headline: 'Significant development': CNN correspondent breaks down impact of Ismail Haniyeh's death
